Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ]
  LAW a suggestion that someone is guilty of something, or that something is the cause of something else: an imputation against sb/sth Nothing in the report carried any imputations against the company.an imputation of sth There was no evidence to support the imputation of embezzlement of funds.
[ U ] a way of calculating something when you do not have the full or correct data: cost/data imputation
